metadata.description: Dataset of emotional cases for training and testing the Emotional Comprehension Pipeline
metadata.purpose: Provide diverse emotional scenarios for system development and validation
metadata.ethical_considerations: This dataset aims to represent diverse emotional experiences including neurodivergent perspectives

categories.description: Cases involving anxiety, stress, and related emotional states

cases.text: My mind won't stop racing with all the things that could go wrong tomorrow.
cases.neurodivergent_considerations: May relate to ADHD or autism-related anxiety patterns

cases.text: I feel like I'm being pulled in a hundred different directions at once.
cases.neurodivergent_considerations: Executive function challenges common in ADHD

categories.description: Cases involving positive emotions like joy, excitement, and enthusiasm

cases.text: I just had the most amazing conversation about quantum physics and I can't stop thinking about it!
cases.neurodivergent_considerations: Autistic joy from deep interest engagement

cases.text: This is going to be incredible! I've been waiting for this moment for so long!

categories.description: Cases involving sadness, grief, loss, and melancholy

cases.text: Everything just feels heavy today. Like I'm moving through fog.
cases.neurodivergent_considerations: May relate to autistic burnout or depression

cases.text: I know it's been months, but sometimes the loss still hits me like it just happened.
cases.neurodivergent_considerations: Grief may be experienced intensely with heightened emotional sensitivity

categories.description: Cases involving confusion, uncertainty, and ambivalence

cases.text: I can't tell if I'm upset about what they said or if I'm just tired and everything feels wrong.
cases.neurodivergent_considerations: Alexithymia is common in autistic individuals

cases.text: Part of me wants to go, but another part of me is screaming to stay home. I'm completely torn.
cases.neurodivergent_considerations: May relate to social anxiety or sensory overwhelm anticipation

categories.description: Cases involving frustration, anger, and irritation

cases.text: Why do people keep changing the plan without telling me? I can't function when things keep shifting.
cases.neurodivergent_considerations: Autistic need for predictability and routine

cases.text: I'm so tired of being misunderstood and having to explain myself over and over.

categories.description: Cases where sensory experiences significantly impact emotional state

cases.text: The buzzing of the fluorescent lights is making my skin crawl. I need to get out of here.
The soft texture of this blanket and the gentle music are making me feel so calm and grounded.

categories.description: Cases involving emotional labor, masking, and burnout

cases.text: I'm exhausted from pretending to be okay all day. I just want to be myself without performing.
cases.neurodivergent_considerations: Autistic masking and its emotional toll

cases.text: I can't do basic things anymore. Even answering messages feels impossible.
cases.neurodivergent_considerations: Autistic burnout requires accommodation and recovery time

categories.description: Cases involving social connection, belonging, and isolation

cases.text: For the first time in ages, I felt like someone really got me. We didn't have to explain ourselves.
I'm surrounded by people but feel completely alone. Like I'm watching life through glass.
cases.neurodivergent_considerations: Common autistic experience of feeling different

categories.description: Cases involving multiple simultaneous or conflicting emotions

cases.text: I'm proud of what I accomplished, but also terrified that it's not good enough and exhausted from the effort.
cases.neurodivergent_considerations: Perfectionism and high standards common in gifted/autistic individuals

cases.text: I love them and want to be there for them, but I'm also angry about how they treated me and confused about what I need.

usage_guidelines.training: These cases can be used for training emotional recognition and response generation systems
usage_guidelines.testing: Use for validation of emotional comprehension accuracy
ethical_considerations: Respect the authenticity of emotional experiences
Recognize that emotions are valid regardless of neurotype
Maintain privacy and dignity in case representation

expansion_notes.community_contributions: We welcome community contributions of emotional cases, especially from neurodivergent individuals sharing their lived experiences
